readable.title: 3730011219_588cdc7972
readable.content: A man and a young child walk along the beach shore . A man and toddler are walking along the beach in front of the ocean . A man at the beach holding a pail , standing next to a child . A man with a bucket and a girl in a hat on the beach . The man is wearing a black shirt , holding a pail , and walking with a child next to the water .
